vaultSetup.title: Vault Set Up
vaultSetup.notEnoughFunds:
To ensure you can unvault at least {{minRecoverableRatioPercentage}}% of your Bitcoin in the future, ThunderDen establishes a minimum vaulting amount.
This assumes express transaction confirmations and the possibility of ultra-high network fees when unvaulting.Suggested Addition: Add about {{missingFunds}} to reach the vaulting minimum.
Note that the exact vaultable amount might slightly differ due to changes in network fee conditions.
